application.doc: Importing a personal certificate into a certificate database

method.name: POST
method.doc: To complete the operation with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP POST command on the SSL Certificates personal certificate resource URI.

request.doc:
POST https://{appliance_hostname}/isam/ssl_certificates/{kdb_id}/personal_cert
POST_DATA: { "operation":"import", "cert": "cert.p12" (as application/octet-stream), "password": "The password of the source certificate container" }
For example, to import a personal certificate using curl:
curl https://10.0.8.23/isam/ssl_certificates/test/personal_cert -u admin:admin -H "Accept: application/json" --form cert=@test.ibm.com.p12 --form password=hunter2 --form operation=import

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: Content-Type:multipart/form-data
param.doc: Required to post the imported files.

param.name: operation
param.doc: The type of create operation to perform. In this case, the value is "import".

param.name: cert
param.doc: The personal certificate in pkcs12 format to be imported. This value can be either a string or a file. For example, "cert":"/tmp/cert.p12" (as application/octet-stream)

param.name: password
param.doc: The password of the source certificate container.

response.doc:
200 ok
Note: For the changes to take effect, they must be deployed as described in Configuration changes commit process.
